review: *** ***** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** *** ***** Such perfection in her work with so friendly demeanor. The entire procedure went so smooth because of her empathetic conduct. Dr. Narla's clinic is a marvel in design and architecture field. Thank you Ma'am:)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Jyoti is very professional and efficient in her work. The first step of getting a dental implant consists of drilling into the jaw bone and securing a nail there, which is left for two months for absolute healing. Dr. Jyoti made this entire scary sounding procedure almost painless. Her clinic is one stop solution for all dental problems. Doctors and staff are well versed with their work and have all advanced machineries to carry out complicated procedures. Their behavior and explanation of the procedure is excellent.

I would recommend 'Cosmodent'  and Dr. Jyoti as well as Dr. Anand Narla (for braces) to all in need of a dental problem.
reply_text: Thank you for the wonderful & positive opinion

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr. Jyoti Narla is a very patient and knowledgable doctor in her field. 
She gave me the right advice on way forward and recommended the best remedy anyone could be happpy with. 

She also helped in getting the apppointment the next day for the wisdom tooth removal since mine was half broken. She explained the whole procedure to me and told me not to fret on it since all shall go well. 

She is friendly and being an expert in her field, am very happy with the time she spent answering my queries and being friendly. I highly recommend her for toooth related problem. Along with her competent team, it was a satisfying and seamless experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Dental Surgery,Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Braces Fixing,Dental X-Ray,Dental Calculus,
review: Dr. Jyoti and Dr. Anand have been my dentists for almost a decade now. Given my persistent teeth issue (which also led to bad breath and extreme sensitivity) I had consulted multiple dentists in the past. It was Dr Jothi and Dr. Anand  @ Cosmodent Clinic (Chandivali, Powai) that explained the root cause (Deep Bite condition) and recommended  appropriate solution. They simplified my trauma to a great degree, and so I am forever thankful to them. Dr. Jyoti is a Gum Surgen, and Dr Anand an Orthodontic Specialist. Both are thorough professionals in their respective spaces. They will be my dentists forever.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Well experienced professional, extremely comforting
Explained well in detail.

Focus was on resolving the issue instead of a short term solution. 

Her understanding was very good. And she focused on what is right for the patient. 

Impressed with the Machines / equipments. Clarity of teeth images, X-ray etc etc. Didn‚Äôt find such detailing thru equipments at an another dentist.


She is v v good. Went to her after visiting few other dentists and was Super Delighted.

Highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
** ***** ** *** ***** I had crown fell off from the root canal. Tooth involved in root canal was decayed and few Dentists suggested me for implant but Dr Jyoti and Keni recommended to save the original tooth. She did the necessary treatment of post and core and I am one happy soul once again. Dr Keni who did the initial check up and did the crown work is also very talented and very good in explaining the course of treatment.
Dr Jyoti is excellent in what she does. Highly recommended. Staff is very polite,  professional and cooperative. The clinic is very clean ,hygienic and well equipped with all hi-tech equipments. I found my dentist for a life now üëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had heard terrible stories of root canal - the tediousness, the pain; the headache etc. Naturally my first root canal and I was anxious and nervous to the point had rescheduled my appointment twice. When I finally got on that chair under the lights,I was nervous and anticipated the pain I had heard so much about being associated with this treatment. But the providence of God in Dr Jyoti, who was brilliant and adept in treating it- I had no pain even post the treatment last night, coz she advised me to have the pain killer before the anaesthesia wears off, I am going in to get the cap set . Dr. Jyoti with her professional touch and efficiency, totally settled my anxiety about this treatment and now I have a testimony different from the ones have heard. Am so grateful. I would definitely recommend Dr Jyoti at Cosmodent and the patience she has üôèüèºWith answering whatever questions I had out of anxiety. Thank you

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had taken my dad earlier (91yrs) to Dr Jyoti for a tooth filling...just 2-3 months later the filling came out....i was upset I had to take him again as it's  very difficult task considering his age...however when I met Dr Jyoti she clearly explained to me that it was not the filling but that a small piece of the tooth had chipped off creating the hole..i was not very convinced but seeing that i was not happy with the situation..she offered to fill up the hole and did not charge me for it either!! It was a very kind gesture and I felt glad I had gone back to her...she is very understanding of a situation...she does her job in a very calm and patient manner and my dad too is quite relaxed during these sessions which is wonderful! I strongly recommend Dr Jyoti and assure you that you will not be disappointed. Thank you Dr Jyoti for being, not just a Dr but also a good human being.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We had booked an appointment for filling via practo. On reaching there there doctor just looked at the teeth of my daughter and said that she was busy and cannot do the filling today .she also guided us to take the xray which was earlier too has been taken during our former vist ..we were not given treatment n charged for double xray and *********** consultation. I would request this feedback to be given to the doctors there and the owner of the clinic too ..not happy with they way they charge ..
reply_text:
You have taken your daughter's appointment for a deep cavity  & on examination it was noticed that there were multiple cavities in front, back teeth on both side & she had complaints of frequent food lodgement in wisdom teeth. In order to check the extent of depth of cavities & condition of wisdom teeth we would require a full mouth xray without the x ray we can't tell the treatment plan.

Even though you didn't take any prior appointment for your checkup of severe toothache & sensitivity still we accomodated you which after the examination revealed that you need a root canal treatment which would require time. 

For proper treatment need good examination & diagnosis which is not possible without x-rays. You both didn't have any old records also.

We charged for consultation & full mouth single x rays taken separately for both of you. Treatment plan was explained in detail & prescription also was given. For further treatment asked to take appointment as the next patient was also waiting in the reception.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

reply_text:
You have got your fillings done from our clinic 1 month ago in 2nd , 3rd molars & after a month you come with problem in the first molar which was root canal treated with cap from other dentist.

 There are three molars on one side & you have been explained in detail about the problem also. Filling of one tooth cannot affect other tooth which was already root canal treated from other dentist.

You are trying to blame that work on me which I didn't even touch. You need to visit your old dentist who did your treatment.

review: I and my husband (both senior citizens) have been treated by Dr. Jyoti Narla ever since we first met her in her clinic  a couple of years ago, for our respective dental treatments. Our experience shows that we always received good advice from her and our problems were competently addressed on each and every occasion, at reasonable cost. Her professionalism combined with empathy, imagination and optimism has greatly  impressed us and we have been vocal among our circle of friends, about her immaculately maintained and well equipped clinic besides above merits pertaining to her individual professional excellence. We wish her well in all that she may choose to do in future and for her continued well being in the service of residents in the area like ourselves.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your words of appreciation.

review: Cosmodent stand out when it comes to cleanliness, sanitization and latest equipment.  Jyoti has really maintained it well.  The ambience with light music doesn't make you feel you are at the doctor's.  Jyoti is patient enough to listen to patient's issues and requirements.  With the use of the latest equipment she's able to bring the complete picture on to the discussion table and understanding the criticality of the current COVID situation she suggests the immediate requirement rather than pushing the patient for any non emergency procedures.  Overall good COVID preparedness and accurate scheduling considering patient's availablity
